General.Name: Dynamic Cables Limited
General.Description: Dynamic Cables Limited manufactures and supplies cables and conductors to energy and power sectors in India and internationally. It offers bare and insulated conductors; 66KV power cables; MV and LV aerial bunched, and power copper and aluminum cables; LV control and concentric cables; railway signaling cables; galvanized stay and earth wires; and UL products. Dynamic Cables Limited was formerly known as Dynamic Engineers. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Jaipur, India.

4.Name: Mr. Govind  Saboo
4.Title: Member of Advisory Board & Lead of Investor Relation Function
